e who has no business being around the property.

With her stealth buffe=
rs on at full power, it would be difficult, if not impossible to detect her=
.  Even her scent was minimized in it's own way.  But, BLACKARACHNIA, hangi=
ng above on the ceiling, stayed still.  Waiting for the sparkling beneath o=
